shapecode_3_y=0.500

shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.00000

shapecode_3_g=0.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000

shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=bba = .5*bba + .5*bass;
per_frame_2=btr = .5*btr + .5*treb;
per_frame_3=bmi = .5*bmi + .5*mid;
per_frame_4=bt = bt + bbass;
per_frame_5=tt = tt + btreb;
per_frame_6=mt = mt + bmid;
per_frame_7=
per_frame_8=tm = tm + .05*(bt+tt+mt);
per_frame_9=
per_frame_10=warp = 0;
per_frame_11=q1 = sin(.25*tm);
per_frame_12=q2 = cos(.25*tm);
per_frame_13=dx = .00125*q1;
per_frame_14=dy = .00125*q2;
per_frame_15=cx = .5+.25*q2;
per_frame_16=cy = .5+.25*q1;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // sample previous frame
warp_4=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_5=`
warp_6=`    
warp_7=`ret += max(
warp_8=`max(GetPixel(uv+float2(1.5,0)*texsize.wz),GetPixel(uv-float2(1.5,0)*texsize.wz)),
warp_9=`max(GetPixel(uv+float2(0,1.5)*texsize.wz),GetPixel(uv-float2(0,1.5)*texsize.wz)));
warp_10=`ret -= GetPixel(uv);
warp_11=`    // darken (decay) over time
warp_12=`ret = ret*.96-.002; //or try: ret -= 0.004;
warp_13=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    float2 uv_echo = (uv - 0.5)*float2(-1,-1) + 0.5;
comp_4=`    ret = abs(lerp( 1.5*tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz-1.25*GetBlur2(uv), 
comp_5=`                1.5*tex2D(sampler_main, uv_echo).xyz-1.25*GetBlur2(uv_echo), 
comp_6=`                .5 
comp_7=`              )); //video echo
comp_8=`    ret *= 1.33; //gamma
comp_9=`    ret *= .25+.75*ret;
comp_10=`    ret = lum(ret)*((hue_shader*8)-6.25); //old hue shader effect
comp_11=`}
